channel.title: How do i change the bonuses of an item!? please some one help
channel.description:
hey. i have just made my own server but i want to know how to change an items bonuses
(eq. whip = 82str bonus : changed to whip = 1000str bonus)
how do u change it!?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2007, 06:14:06 AM[/size][hr]is any one even looking at these forums or what!?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2007, 06:29:36 AM[/size][hr] :mad: :mad: :mad: theres nearly been 10 visits and i havnt got an answer please someone help me!

item.title: How do i change the bonuses of an item!? please some one help
item.dc:creator: @oinkie oinkie
item.source: How do i change the bonuses of an item!? please some one help

item.title: How do i change the bonuses of an item!? please some one help
item.dc:creator: @armorstr armorstr
item.description:
@armorstr wrote:

ok go to your source, find the thing called item.cfg. not Item, lowercase i. then click ctrl+f, type in whip, search, itâ€™ll come up with something like:

item = 4151	Abyssal_whip	A_weapon_from_the_abyss.	1000000	1000000	1000000	100	100	100	0	0	0	0	0	0	0	75	0

the numbers 100 100 100 0 0 0 0 0 0 75 need to be changed. change the 75 to 1000.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the bonuses of an item!? please some one help
